bullet_1: file most information online for this company without the authentication code
bullet_2: view and manage other people who are digitally authorised to file online for this company
bullet_3: digitally authorise other people to file online for this company
keep_the_authentication_code: Keep the authentication code in a safe place, as you may still need it in the future.
last_paragraph: We’ve sent an email to any other people who are authorised. We’ve let them know you are now digitally authorised to file for this company.
title_finish: to your account - Find and update company information - GOV.UK
what_happens_now: What happens now you’ve added this company
